comments:
Description:
When previewing one script datasource example from BIRT website, ScriptEvaluationError is thrown out.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Get ScriptedDatasourceExampleBefore.rptdesign from http://www.eclipse.org/birt/phoenix/examples/scripting/scripteddatasource/
2. Preview it, ScriptEvaluationError is thrown out.

Error log:
The following items have errors: 

Image (id = 9): 
- There are errors evaluating script "http://download1.eclipse.org/birt/downloads/examples/images/ClassicLogo.jpg". 
Error.ScriptEvaluationError ( 1 time(s) )

1. The URL should be an expression instead of a constant string, use " to enclose the URL value.
2. An java-class is not imported.

The example should be modified.

The example should update to use " to enclose URL value. Other ScriptEvaluationError are caused by not importing SampleClass.java. After correcting URL and importing SampleClass.java, the report can be previewed correctly. But when preview results in Data Set editor, DataException is thrown out.

Error log:
org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.core.DataException: A BIRT exception occurred: Error evaluating Javascript expression. Script engine error: TypeError: [JavaPackage SimpleClass] is not a function. (DataSet[Favorite].__bm_open#2)
